metadata.title: CVE-2022-3304 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in CSS in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
